app_name: Super GPS Compass Map for Android 2019
app_detail:
â›µ Super GPS Compass Map For Android a combination of GPS navigation, compass and google map to help you navigate and find your way quickly. GPS compass map takes advantage of compass & GPS & Network to get your position on Earth, and obtains map information near your location using Google Map and GPS locator and also provide the location.

â›µ Super GPS compass map direction is smart compass app free, starts fast and which used to select direction. Digital compass app is a tool to search bearings (azimuth, directions) using embedded magnetic sensors.

â›µ When you travel and lost you way then use Super GPS Compass Map to get directions. Best GPS compass navigation can be used for most of your outdoor activities such as travel, picnics, camping, hiking or boating.

ğŸ”” Feature GPS Compass Map for Android ğŸ””
ğŸ”” GPS Compass Map for Android is a digital smart compass ğŸ””
â¡ GPS compass map is a simple but higher accuracy digital compass and it is very easy to use and i think this very helpful compass app for anyone and especially those who loved trip, picnics, camping, hiking or even boating.
â¡ Digital compass app is a tool to search bearings (azimuth, directions) using embedded magnetic sensor.
â¡ Smart compass free is the most specific and performance upgraded compass app available. Best compass app supports magnetic field northern and true north using compass sensor, network or GPS navigation location coordinates and google map
â¡ When travel, picnics, camping, hiking or even boating lost your way then look at your direction by led compass.Use this smart compass for choose direction of place which you want. Adjustment notification icon will help you maintain compass in high care while using this space needle.
GPS Map for Android is a GPS navigation tool with Google Map
â¡ Whether you are travelling, commuting to work or driving professionally, GPS navigation & maps is your one tool for everything.
â¡ GPS navigation allows users to provide the location of your and navigate destinations via directions and search maps using a number of different methods.
â¡ GPS compass map allows user to find Restaurants, ATMS, Hotels, Bank, Schools, University, Post office, Cafe and Police station etc nearby.
â¡ GPS map is free access to maps, navigation & traffic. You will have access to accurate world maps in 220 countries and territories.

ğŸ€ Important:
To use GPS compass map for Android, hold your Android device flat, use just like a real compass. Your device must have magnetic sensor inside to read earth magnetic field. If your device does not have magnetic sensor compass app will not work.
